name: Node MySQL Login
description: An express webserver that uses a MySQL server to manage user logins, to facilitate access to restricted or user specific pages. Using Express routers was setup to handle the rendering of pages and another router setup to handle user authentication for pages, and the reistration and login/out process.

name: Chat App
description: Simple chat app created using nodejs and socket.io. Users can join virtual chatrooms and chat with other people who have joined a room of the same name.
